name: Fish Pong (Late Seajam game)
description:
This is a crappy pong that I made for Seajam but I didn't realize that seajam ended 2 hours before this upload. This if my very first ever game made. The only glitch in it that I know of is the ball (fish) can get stuck in the paddle and spaz out. I am open to criticism and advice. Thank you all!

This has only been tested on Windows and Linux!
